ios.title: Learn R - Course, Manual, Package
ios.description:
Learn R covers course and tutorial for R from basic, intermediate, to advance. You can search tutorials, packages, references, and manuals. You can bookmark for offline reading

Latest
+ This page shows all latest R course. Tutorials will be update frequently with no additional cost. Contents come from our server. No need to update your app for fresh content. Make sure to check frequently for content update. App update will be feature enhancements or bug fixes
+ Bookmark your favorite R course. It will be saved in Bookmark page and then you can access it offline
+ Search R course. Course content is searchable. You can search course using your own keyword, instead of title, for example: create chart, import data, etc. Learn R will give max 100 courses related to your search keyword. See screenshot 2
+ Bookmark search result. It will be saved in Browse page and you can browse and organize offline

Package
+ Learn R come with powerful search for R package utilizing machine learning. There are billions R packages. Imposible to remember each one. Learn R come to rescue. You can search R package using your own keyword, instead of package name, for example: create chart, making maps, etc. Learn R will give max 100 R packages related to your search keyword. See screenshot 3
+ Read package manual
+ Bookmark your favorite package manual. It will be saved in Package page and you can access it offline
+ Organize bookmark: reorder, delete, etc

Manual
+ Learn R come with powerful search for R manual utilizing machine learning. You can search R manual using your own keyword, instead of package name, for example: create chart, working with data, etc. Learn R will give max 100 R packages related to your search keyword.
+ Read R manual
+ Bookmark your favorite package manual. It will be saved in Package page and you can access it offline
+ Organize bookmark: reorder, delete, etc

Reference
+ Learn R come with powerful search for R reference utilizing machine learning. You can search R reference using your own keyword, instead of package name, for example: create chart, working with data, etc. Learn R will give max 100 R packages related to your search keyword.
+ Read R reference
+ Bookmark your favorite reference. It will be saved in Package page and you can access it offline
+ Organize bookmark: reorder, delete, etc

Reader
+ Read course, R manual, package manual, R reference
+ Bookmark so you can read offline
+ Learn R come with powerfull reader that will make your day!
+ Change text size
+ Change font
+ Change theme. We have 4 themes (light, night, sepia, grey)
+ Syntax highlighting for R command and R output
+ Horizontal scroll for table, code block, and output block so that the content remain tidy

Browse
+ Bookmark search result. It will be saved in Browse page and you can access it offline
+ Organize search result: reorder, delete, etc

Support
+ We have in-app-support

highlights: Powerful search for programming documentation utilizing machine learning
Bookmark search result. It will be saved in Browse page and you can access it offline
Organize search result: delete item, reorder item
Horizontal scroll for table, code block, and output block
Organize all notes: delete item, reorder item
